text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Home health agency" means a health-related institution, organization, or a part of an institution that:
Is owned or operated by 1 or more persons, whether or not for profit and whether as a public or private enterprise; and
Directly or through a contractual arrangement, provides to a sick or disabled individual in the residence of that individual skilled nursing services, home health aid services, and at least one other home health care service that are centrally administered.

section.section:
However, the provisions of this subsection do not apply to:
A nursing referral service agency that is licensed as a nursing referral service agency under the provisions of Subtitle 4B of this title; or
A home-based hospice care program that is licensed as a home-based hospice care program under the provisions of Subtitle 9 of this title.
A home health agency shall also be licensed as a hospice care program if the home health agency operates a hospice care program that is distinct from its other services.
